name: twitter-Author-follow
author: Gennaro Oliviero

sections.description: With this plugin you can use the shortcode [twitter-author] to add a nice preview of the author’s twitter profile in your post. The only requirement is that the author has indicated his twitter nickname in the user management page of WordPress.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload twitter-Author-follow.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Where can I use the shortcode?

You should use the shortcode in the posts

where can I insert the author’s Twitter profile Name?

go to user management, select one of your Users and compile the “Twitter” field with the name that he uses on Twitter, for example: if he uses “@thisIsMyName” you should insert “thisIsMyName”

short_description: This plugin helps you to show the author twitter profile in your posts using the shortcode [twitter-author]
